languages.text: "Дайте ульям сигнал распахнуть врата — мы не бросим ни единого человека в пустошах".
"Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not abandon a single person in the wastelands."
languages.original_text: "Дайте ульям сигнал распахнуть врата — мы не бросим ни единого человека в пустошах".

traits.locale_text: "Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not let a single person to get lost in the wastelands."
"Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not let a single person to get lost in the wastelands."
"Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not abandon a single person in the wastelands."
"Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not allow a single person to get lost in the wastelands."
"Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not allow a single person to get lost in the wastelands."
"Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not abandon a single person in the wastelands."
"Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not abandon a single person in the wastelands."
"Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not abandon a single person in the wastelands."

languages.text: “命令所有巢都打开大门，我们绝不能将任何人遗弃在废土上。”
languages.original_text: "Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not abandon a single person in the wastelands."

traits.locale_text: “命令所有巢都打开大门，我们绝不能将任何人遗弃在废土上。”
“命令所有巢都打开大门，我们绝不能让任何人迷失在废土上。”

languages.text: «Avise a las colmenas para que abran las puertas. No abandonaremos ni a una sola persona en los páramos».
languages.original_text: "Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not abandon a single person in the wastelands."

traits.locale_text: «Avise a las colmenas para que abran las puertas. No abandonaremos ni a una sola persona en los páramos».

languages.text: 「ハイヴに門を開けるよう合図を送るのだ...ウエストランドで迷える者を一人も出してはならない」
languages.original_text: "Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not abandon a single person in the wastelands."

traits.locale_text: 「ハイヴに門を開けるよう合図を送るのだ...ウエストランドで迷える者を一人も出してはならない」
「ハイヴに門を開けるよう合図を送るのだ...ウエストランドで迷える者を一人も出してはならない」

languages.text: « Sommez les ruches d'ouvrir leurs portes. Nous n'abandonnerons personne dans les terres désolées. »
languages.original_text: "Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not abandon a single person in the wastelands."

traits.locale_text: « Sommez les ruches d'ouvrir leurs portes. Nous n'abandonnerons personne dans les terres désolées. »

languages.text: "Sagt den Makropolen, sie sollen die Tore öffnen — wir lassen niemanden im Ödland zurück."
languages.original_text: "Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not abandon a single person in the wastelands."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt den Makropolen, sie sollen die Tore öffnen — wir lassen niemanden im Ödland zurück."
"Sagt den Makropolen, sie sollen die Tore öffnen — wir lassen nicht zu, dass sich auch nur eine einzige Seele im Ödland verirrt."

languages.text: "Kovanlara kapıları açma sinyali verin. Tek bir kişiyi bile çorak topraklarda bırakmayacağız."
languages.original_text: "Signal the hives to open the gates — we will not abandon a single person in the wastelands."

traits.locale_text: "Kovanlara kapıları açma sinyali verin. Tek bir kişiyi bile çorak topraklarda bırakmayacağız."
